languages.text: "Работники службы безопасности выслеживают тех, кто поддерживает повстанцев, а регулярная стража уничтожает этих вредителей безо всякой жалости, но они появляются снова и снова. Мои писари сбились с ног, протоколируя все публичные суды и казни, но я убежден, что вскоре губернатор найдет решение".

traits.locale_text: "Работники службы безопасности выслеживают тех, кто поддерживает повстанцев, а регулярная стража уничтожает этих вредителей безо всякой жалости, но они появляются снова и снова. Мои писари сбились с ног, протоколируя все публичные суды и казни, но я убежден, что вскоре губернатор найдет решение".

languages.text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."
languages.original_text: "Работники службы безопасности выслеживают тех, кто поддерживает повстанцев, а регулярная стража уничтожает этих вредителей безо всякой жалости, но они появляются снова и снова. Мои писари сбились с ног, протоколируя все публичные суды и казни, но я убежден, что вскоре губернатор найдет решение".

traits.locale_text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular guards are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

"Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular guards are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

"Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular guards are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

"Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

languages.text: “我们的安保部门正在追查那些支持叛军的人，而普通守卫则毫不留情地铲除这些破坏者，但敌人却源源不断地出现。为了记录所有的公开听证与处决，我的记录官们几乎快要跑断了腿。不过我相信，总督很快就会找到解决方案。”
languages.original_text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

traits.locale_text: “我们的安保部门正在追查那些支持叛军的人，而普通守卫则毫不留情地铲除这些破坏者，但敌人却源源不断地出现。为了记录所有的公开听证与处决，我的记录官们几乎快要跑断了腿。不过我相信，总督很快就会找到解决方案。”

languages.text: «Nuestros servicios de seguridad están investigando a quienes apoyan a los rebeldes, y nuestros guardias habituales exterminan a los saboteadores sin piedad, pero no dejan de surgir más. Mis escribas están agotados con el registro de tantos juicios y ejecuciones, pero sé que la gobernadora encontrará una solución pronto».
languages.original_text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros servicios de seguridad están investigando a quienes apoyan a los rebeldes, y nuestros guardias habituales exterminan a los saboteadores sin piedad, pero no dejan de surgir más. Mis escribas están agotados con el registro de tantos juicios y ejecuciones, pero sé que la gobernadora encontrará una solución pronto».

languages.text: 「警備隊は反乱軍を支援する輩を追跡し、正規ワーデンは妨害工作を行う者を情け容赦なく殲滅していますが、反乱軍の出現は続いています。私の書記官は全ての公聴会と死刑執行の記録をとるので大忙しですが、総督がまもなく解決策を示してくださると確信しています」
languages.original_text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

traits.locale_text: 「警備隊は反乱軍を支援する輩を追跡し、正規ワーデンは妨害工作を行う者を情け容赦なく殲滅していますが、反乱軍の出現は続いています。私の書記官は全ての公聴会と死刑執行の記録をとるので大忙しですが、総督がまもなく解決策を示してくださると確信しています」

languages.text: "Unsere Sicherheitskräfte ermitteln die Unterstützer der Rebellen, und unsere Wächter eliminieren die Saboteure ohne jede Gnade, aber es tauchen immer wieder welche auf. Meine Schreiber arbeiten unermüdlich an der Dokumentierung sämtlicher öffentlicher Anhörungen und Hinrichtungen, aber ich bin zuversichtlich, dass die Gouverneurin bald eine Lösung findet."
languages.original_text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Sicherheitskräfte ermitteln die Unterstützer der Rebellen, und unsere Wächter eliminieren die Saboteure ohne jede Gnade, aber es tauchen immer wieder welche auf. Meine Schreiber arbeiten unermüdlich an der Dokumentierung sämtlicher öffentlicher Anhörungen und Hinrichtungen, aber ich bin zuversichtlich, dass die Gouverneurin bald eine Lösung findet."

languages.text: « Nos services de sécurité traquent ceux qui soutiennent les rebelles, tandis que nos gardiens éliminent les saboteurs sans pitié. Hélas, il en vient toujours d'autres pour les remplacer. Mes scribes ne savent plus où donner de la tête avec tous ces procès et exécutions publics à consigner, mais je suis certain que la gouverneure trouvera bientôt une solution. »
languages.original_text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

traits.locale_text: « Nos services de sécurité traquent ceux qui soutiennent les rebelles, tandis que nos gardiens éliminent les saboteurs sans pitié. Hélas, il en vient toujours d'autres pour les remplacer. Mes scribes ne savent plus où donner de la tête avec tous ces procès et exécutions publics à consigner, mais je suis certain que la gouverneure trouvera bientôt une solution. »

languages.text: "Güvenlik güçlerimiz, isyancıları destekleyenleri izliyor. Muvazzaf dizdarlar ise bu sabotajcıları zerre merhamet göstermeden yok ediyor ama peydahlanmaya devam ediyorlar. Katiplerim, halka açık tüm duruşmalar ile infazların kaydını tutmakla meşgul. Lakin valinin yakında bir çözüm bulacağından eminim."
languages.original_text: "Our security services are tracking those who support the rebels, and our regular wardens are wiping out these saboteurs without the slightest mercy, but they keep on appearing. My scribes have been run off their feet, keeping records of all the public hearings and executions, but I am confident that the governor will find a solution soon."

traits.locale_text: "Güvenlik güçlerimiz, isyancıları destekleyenleri izliyor. Muvazzaf askerler ise bu sabotajcıları zerre merhamet göstermeden yok ediyor ama peydahlanmaya devam ediyorlar. Katiplerim, halka açık tüm duruşmalar ile infazların kaydını tutmakla meşgul. Lakin valinin yakında bir çözüm bulacağından eminim."
